name: get_coverage
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool us_cell_coverage_by_zip_code.
Tool description: Check Cell Coverage by zip code for all US networks
API description: Retrieves cell coverage information for major US carriers (AT&T, T-Mobile, U.S. Cellular, and Verizon) based on the provided zip code.

postcode.description: The zip code for which to retrieve cell coverage information.
